details.description:
The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Classic Burgundy W arrives in a white, burgundy, and light gray color scheme.
​
​The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Classic Burgundy W has on the upper as a base white leather with light grey suede overlays on the front and back of the shoe for an elevated appearance. In addition, on the side it features a burgundy N logo on the medial side. There is New Balance branding on the sneaker’s tongue, in a matching burgundy base. The shoe's lightweight foam midsole and rubber outsole provide comfort and grip.
​
​The women’s rendition of the New Balance 327 Moonbeam Classic Burgundy was released on September 24th, 2020, and retailed at a price of $90.

The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Outerspace (W) arrives in a moonbeam, outerspace colorway.

The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Outerspace for women features a white and gray color scheme. The shoe features an upper that is constructed of a combination of suede and white leather with gray detailing. The shoe's upper has embroidered branding and a distinctive N emblem. The midsole is made of lightweight EVA foam for cushioning and shock absorption, while the rubber outsole delivers traction and grip.

The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Outerspace (W) was released on February 1st, 2021, and sold for a retail price of $90.

The New Balance 327 Moonbeam True Red (Women's) takes inspiration from '70s NB running shoe design and combines it with aspects of several New Balance silhouettes in order to come up with comfortable running and lifestyle shoe. This sneaker is specifically sized for women.

The Moonbeam True Red (Women's) New Balance 327 with a wedge silhouette begins with a base of moonbeam-colored nylon with a collar padded for enhanced comfort. Tonal suede overlays inspired by the NB 320, 355, and Supercomp adorn the toebox, eyestays, and heel. Red New Balance branding hits the medial heel overlay and complements the red tongue tag with a moonbeam flying NB. The flared midsole of moonbeam foam rests atop a lugged gum rubber outsole that wraps up the toe and heel, a feature that is also a nod to the NB 320, 355, and Supercomp.

The stand-out feature that makes this pair of women’s sneakers pop is the oversized side-panel N in textured red leather that will turn heads with every step you take. The New Balance 327 Moonbeam True Red (Women's) was released on April 3, 2024, for $100 retail.

The New Balance 327 Moonbeam Black Gum (Women's) is a lifestyle shoe with a low-top profile that features an outsole that extends to the heel counter and toe tip.

This Moonbeam Black Gum colorway is from the New Balance 327 line and presents in women’s sizing. It is a stylish silhouette that provides stability and comfort, making it an everyday staple for any closet. The faux leather upper is in white while moonbeam-colored overlays adorn the toe area, eyelet, and heel area. The soft neutrals are elegant and a bold textured branding hit in the form of a large, black "N" adorns the lateral side.

Our experts think that the bubble-wrap like outsole that creeps up to the heel is what makes the New Balance 327 Moonbeam Black Gum (Women's) standout. The distinctive design is eye-catching, and the lugs provide well-needed traction. When it debuted on March 21, 2024, this sneaker had a $100 price tag.

The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Black arrives sporting a heritage running silhouette inspired by the '70s.

The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Black is crafted from a breathable, lightweight nylon and suede upper, padded insole, and shock-absorbing rubber sole for unmatched comfort. New Balance's hard-to-miss "N" logo graces the sides in black in addition to the NB hits on the tongue and insoles alike. Finally, its design is rounded off with a midsole lined in a durable black rubber outsole that runs from the top heel to the toe.

The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Black was released in March 2021 and retailed for $90.

The New Balance 327 Black White Gum W takes on a 70s-style silhouette that became one of the most celebrated in the running catalog for women.

The upper section of this 327 model features a synthetic black base with black suede overlays and an oversized "N" on the side panel in white tumbled leather. New Balance branding appears on the tongue tag, insole, and the medial mudguard. A thick white midsole and a gum outsole with dot-pattern traction that curls up the toe and the heel rounds out the look of this shoe.

The New Balance 327 Black White Gum W was released on July 21, 2022 for $100 retail.

The New Balance 327 Black Moonbeam (W) arrives in a white and black color palette, and a brown rubber sole provides contrast.

The New Balance 327 Black Moonbeam for women features a black suede upper that is accentuated by a white 'N' logo on the lateral sides. The shoe features a mesh toe box that makes it lightweight and breathable. The sneaker also has a sturdy rubber outsole for traction and grip. The shoe's design is completed with a cushioned, supportive foam midsole sitting on the brown rubber outsole.

The New Balance 327 Black Moonbeam (W) was released on July 21st, 2021, and sold for a retail price of $90.

name: New Balance 327 Sea Salt Rust Oxide (Women's)

details.description:
The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Rust Oxide (Women's) upper features durable leather and breathable mesh material for comfort. The rubber outsole offers optimal traction, while the sock-like fit reinforces heel integrity.

The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Rust Oxide (W) has a 4mm drop and a lightweight upper for a quick, responsive feel. The sneaker also features enhanced dampness control for reduced risk of blistering, which also prevents moisture retention and increased breathability. The sneaker is available in women’s sizing.

The women’s New Balance 327 Sea Salt Rust Oxide (W) was released in March 2022 and retailed at $110.

The New Balance 327 Dark Earth Mushroom paints the 327 in an earthy colorway of Mushroom and Dark Earth. This sneaker boasts a low-top design with minimal padding around the collar and a flat tongue.

This simple running sneaker finds inspiration in heritage running shoes in the New Balance Catalog from the 1970s. Like the OG version, it features a classic wedge silhouette and premium materials. Contemporary upgrades include the oversized New Balance N on the side panels, which comes in white and disappears beneath the midsole and the laces. Using a lightweight, slightly shiny material, the upper is inspired by the 320 and the 355 styles. Like the 355, this New Balance sneaker boasts a rubber outsole that completely wraps over the heel. The rubber outsole comes in black and offers trail-inspired lugs.

Our experts at StockX like the contrast between the synthetic base in Dark Earth and the suede overlays in Mushroom. The New Balance 327 Dark Earth Mushroom was released on October 1, 2023, and retailed at $100.

name: New Balance 327 Sea Salt Leopard Pantera (Women's)

details.description:
The New Balance 327 Sea Salt Leopard Pantera (Women's) is a unique colorway of the New Balance 327, a lifestyle sneaker with a retro-inspired design which first debuted in April 2020.

The upper of this shoe is crafted using a combination of leather, suede and synthetic materials and features an off-white color scheme which closely resembles the color cream. It has a thick midsole which provides cushioning and comfort and a gum rubber outsole. Branding elements on this New Balance 327 include the iconic ‘N’ logo on the side which showcases a leopard print, the ‘NB’ logo on the tongue and more branding on the lateral side of the heel.

One of the stand-out features on this New Balance 327 Sea Salt Leopard Pantera (Women's) is the outsole, which has studs on the underfoot to help improve grip and traction during everyday activities. The women’s sized shoe was released for retail priced at $130 on the 14th of February 2023.

name: New Balance 327 Black White Tongue Logo

details.description:
The New Balance 327 Black White Tongue Logo paints the recognizable New Balance 327 silhouette in an all-black colorway with tiny, white accents.

Paying homage to the running shoe silhouettes from the 1970s, the NB 327 Black White Tongue boasts a low-top design and a smooth, foam midsole. Like other versions of the New Balance 327, the 'Black White Tongue' iteration features a grippy rubber outsole that wraps around the shoe and looks almost like tire tread. Suede overlays cross the lightweight, mesh upper and overlap the oversized leather ‘N’ on the lateral side panel.

Our StockX experts like the minimal white accents. For example, the only white details can be found on the tongue and the medial side panel. The tongue houses a logo tag with ‘NB’ in white, while white threads make two lines on the medial side panel. ‘New Balance’ is also printed across a heel overlay. The New Balance 327 Black White Tongue Logo was released on November 25th, 2022, and retailed at $90.

The New Balance 327 Marsh Green is a lifestyle shoe that blends a vintage vibe with street-ready style in a marsh green and new spruce color combo.

Channeling a back to nature aesthetic with dark green shades, this stylish New Balance 327 silhouette provides stability and comfort. You’ll spot various textures on the upper from ripstop nylon and mesh, to soft nubuck. Marsh green adorns the toe area, eyestay and side panels, while a furry white heel cage and smooth, white oversized "N" on the lateral side panel add balance. A sail midsole sits atop the distinctive eye-catching outsole with bubble lugs that rises up on to the heel. A pop of red adorns the branded tongue patch.

We think that the New Balance 327 Marsh Green brings a unique visual punch that fits in almost any wardrobe and pairs well with streetwear, casual outfits, or even elevated basics. Originally released on July 1, 2024, this sneaker sold for $100 retail.

name: New Balance 327 Dark Mushroom Outer Space
New Balance 327 Vintage Indigo Arctic Grey

details.description:
The New Balance 327 Vintage Indigo Arctic Gray is modeled after running shoes from the 1970s and features an upper crafted from premium materials.

With a foam midsole and suede overlays inspired by classic sneakers in the New Balance catalog, this version of the 327 also boasts contemporary upgrades. For example, the silhouette has a more angular design and a rubber outsole with lugs inspired by trail running sneakers wraps up and over the heel. The running shoe also features an oversized ‘N’ on the lateral side panel. The base is crafted from lightweight mesh in a light beige, while the overlays come in Vintage Indigo. Panels by the lace cage and the ‘N’ display a soft Arctic Gray that complements the Vintage Indigo.

Our StockX experts like the split eye row, which divides the panels of the lace cage into two parts. The New Balance 327 Vintage Indigo Arctic Gray was released on November 27th, 2022, and retailed at $100.
